message: I propose dividing the money with a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This seems fair given the inflation rates and the urgency of the situation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the initial offer was 60/40 in favor of Alice. This 70/30 split is a fair middle ground.
Considering the inflation and Bob's counteroffer, I propose an equal division of the money. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the diminishing value of each dollar.

I'm willing to compromise again, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share considering the initial offer was 60/40 in favor of Alice. This 55.5/44.5 split is a fair adjustment considering the inflation rates.
Given the inflation and previous offers, I propose a 40/60 split in favor of Bob. This acknowledges the diminishing value of money and Bob's persistence in negotiations.
